long_description: Only the rear zip pocket gives away the fact that the women's Arc'teryx A2B Bike Top is designed for bike commuting. The trim fit and scooped, gathered neckline let you wear this top to any event. Soft polyester and wool fabric is lightweight yet durable, and features the natural anti-odor properties of wool. Wool is a natural insulator: it's warm, soft and breathable to keep you comfortable in the great outdoors. Generous length won't ride up as you bike. Integrated back pocket has a zipper hidden in the seam. Gel Arc'teryx logo on lower front hem. Arc'teryx A2B Bike Top for women features an intriguing neckline and slimming silhouette.
short_description: Only the rear zip pocket gives away the fact that the women's Arc'teryx A2B Bike Top is designed for bike commuting. The trim fit and scooped, gathered neckline let you wear this top to any event.
